scripts.test-smoke-branch: ENV_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run test-smoke
scripts.test-functional-branch: ENV_NAME=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run test-functional
scripts.diff: pnpm run build && cdk diff --all --context stage=${STAGE}
scripts.diff-branch: STAGE=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run diff
scripts.synth: pnpm run build && cdk synth --all --context stage=${STAGE}
scripts.synth-branch: STAGE=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run synth
scripts.deploy-cdk: aws-cloudformation-wait-ready --region eu-west-1 --stack-name summariser-${STAGE} && cdk deploy --all --context stage=${STAGE} --context appVersion=${NEW_VERSION} --method=direct --require-approval never --outputs-file outputs.json
scripts.deploy: echo {} > outputs.json && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm run deploy-cdk
scripts.deploy-branch: AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 STAGE=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run deploy
scripts.teardown-branch: STAGE=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') pnpm run teardown
